question: The ancient city of Raj Griha which is modern Rajgir near Patna was built by which of the following kings?
explanation: The ancient city of Rajgriha which is modern Rajgir near Patna was built by Bimbisara. BimbisƒÅra also known as Seniya or Shrenika in the Jain histories was a King of Magadha and belonged to the Haryanka dynasty. He was the son of Bhattiya.
